scriptsComments.start: Starts both applications (Sanity Studio and Next.js) in development mode
scriptsComments.sanity-dev: Starts Sanity Studio's development server (the `sanity start` command runs within the `studio` folder)
scriptsComments.next-dev: `Starts the Next.js application in development mode with hot-code reloading, error reporting, etc.
scriptsComments.build: Vercel CI build command: creates optimized production builds of both applications (Sanity Studio and Next.js)
scriptsComments.sanity-build: Builds the current Sanity configuration to a static bundle

scripts.build: npm run sanity-build && pwd && next build
